name: @double-agent/http-headers
description: Compares header order, capitalization and default values to normal (recorded) user agent values

scripts.start: MAIN_DOMAIN=ulixee-test.org SAME_SITE_DOMAIN=a1.ulixee-test.org CROSS_SITE_DOMAIN=a1.dlf.org PROFILES_DIR=./test-profiles node index.js
scripts.prod: GENERATE_PROFILES=1 LETSENCRYPT=1 MAIN_DOMAIN=headers.ulixee.org SAME_SITE_DOMAIN=a1.ulixee.org CROSS_SITE_DOMAIN=headers.dataliberationfoundation.org HTTP_PORT=80 HTTPS_PORT=443 node index.js
